rules.description: PrintScr => Screenshot to File (If Alone) and Long press to open Screenshot App
CAPS_LOCK to HYPER (SHIFT+COMMAND+OPTION+CONTROL) or ESCAPE (If Alone)

from.description: Avoid starting sysdiagnose with the built-in macOS shortcut cmd+shift+option+ctrl+/

rules.description: Toggle caps_lock by pressing left_shift then right_shift
Hyper + F1 => Sleep, F2 => Monitor Off, F3 => Shut Down
Hyper + h => Home, ; => End, ijkl, u => PgUp, n => PgDn, ' => Delete
Hyper + c > Copy Selected Text to 2nd Editor Group
Hyper + , => Move Left by 1 word and . => Move Right by 1 word
